pitch.cc: Dangerous count for Max Scherzer; Kyle Seager is a dead-red fastball hitter, with a .777 OPS against them this season and .709 against everything else.
Max Scherzer didn't stick to the scouting report; Kyle Seager is hitting .667 this season against four-seam fastballs in that location.
